title: Minister G L Peiris Refutes LTTE Propaganda in London
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma Delivering the Keynote Address of the first Dialogue between the International Institute of Strategic Studies (IISS) in London and the Ministry of External Affairs of Sri Lanka, the External Affairs Minister Professor G.L Peiris said that it is regrettable that groups close to the LTTE, knowing very well that…
